favorite.name: Christine
favorite.comment: The service is outstanding and that everything is fresh and great especially the pizza i would want to go back.

favorite.name: Chloe
favorite.comment: Kaloyan's Pizza is sooooooooo awesome!!! CJ was really friendly and delivered the most delicious pizza ever.

favorite.name: Victor
favorite.comment: Visiting from out of town and a friend suggested Kaloyan's Pizza. She was spot on...so good.

favorite.name: Rikki
favorite.comment: I think I'm in love! It's just so good! Melts in your mouth and leaves you wanting more.
